snippet: The United States and the International Maritime Organization are drawing up recommendations for the operation of the mini-submarines that ferry visitors to the Titanic.
abstract: United States government experts and the International Maritime Organization have put together the first comprehensive map of the Titanic's resting place, along with recommendations for operators of mini-submarines ferrying tourists to the site; tourist submarines have a history of damaging the increasingly fragile wreck, and officials hope that the map and recommendations will protect the ship's remains.
lead_paragraph: The United States and the International Maritime Organization are drawing up recommendations for the operation of the mini-submarines that ferry visitors to the Titanic.

headline.seo: Seeking Guidelines to Protect Fragile Titanic From Visitors
headline.main: A Fragile Tourist Attraction on the Ocean Floor
headline.print_headline: A Fragile Tourist Attraction on the Ocean Floor
